channel.title: Annoying DC
channel.description:
Hello,
I'm pretty good with Java, so I'm normally not the one asking questions but nonetheless I have been stumped by what is probably a simple problem.
I am adding some nice new shops onto a 317 server (Not delta). Everything works fine if you left click on them, but the second you right click -> Trade, you are disconnected. I looked for the case which controls right clicks, and added the same code into that area as I had for the left click (first click).
This made no difference and I keep disconnecting. It's very frustrating and I'm hoping I am just being blind here.
If someone helps me out well then I guess I will rep++.
Thanks, Eddy.

item.title: Annoying DC
item.dc:creator: @durial12 durial12
item.description:
@durial12 wrote:

Hello,

I’m pretty good with Java, so I’m normally not the one asking questions but nonetheless I have been stumped by what is probably a simple problem.

I am adding some nice new shops onto a 317 server (Not delta). Everything works fine if you left click on them, but the second you right click -> Trade, you are disconnected. I looked for the case which controls right clicks, and added the same code into that area as I had for the left click (first click).

This made no difference and I keep disconnecting. It’s very frustrating and I’m hoping I am just being blind here.

If someone helps me out well then I guess I will rep++.
